author: thomreis
body:
Backport of #24578 

The revert from PR #24552 is undone before adding the fix for the initial problem.

The L1T emulators should run before the offline L1T DQM modules that use them.
This PR places the required sequences in front of the modules.
title: L1T offline DQM - Run L1T emulator sequences before the DQM modules - 102x
